import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; export const Signup = () => { const [fullName, setFullName] = useState({ fname: ' ', email: ' ', mobile: ' ', proff: ' ', pass: ' ', cpass: ' ', }); const InpFun = (event) => { const {name, value } = event.target; setFullName((preValue) => { return { ...preValue, [name]: value, }; }) } const submitFun = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); } return ( <>

Sign up

{fullName.fname}

{fullName.email}

{fullName.mobile}

{fullName.proff}

{fullName.pass}

{fullName.cpass}

) }
